'''Slightly Damaged Wooden Plank''' is a Quest Item obtainable in the Event [[World Quest]], "[[From Outer Lands]]."

==Text==
"Though the front half was lost, we've somehow managed to stay afloat on the remaining back half for some time now... Now that's what I call a ship, haha! Unfortunately, most of the ship's load is probably sitting at the bottom of the sea by now..."<br />
"...It seems like... we floated here on the southeast currents? Well, that doesn't matter. The problem that we need to solve right now is how to leave this place..."
